name: Ojo
ability: Each night*, choose a character: they die. If they are not in play, the Storyteller chooses who dies.

legacy.otherNightReminder: The Ojo points to a character on the sheet. If that character is in play, they die. Otherwise, the Storyteller chooses who dies.

otherNights.description: Each night*, choose a character: they die. If they are not in play, the Storyteller chooses who dies.
